hotels.name: Om Beach Resort
hotels.description: A charming resort located right on Om Beach, offering comfortable accommodations and easy access to the beach.

hotels.name: Hotel Namaste
hotels.description: A budget-friendly hotel with basic amenities, located near Gokarna’s main attractions.

vacation_rentals.name: Airbnb - Beachside Cottage
vacation_rentals.description: A cozy cottage offering direct access to the beach and a relaxing atmosphere.

vacation_rentals.name: Airbnb - Gokarna Retreat
vacation_rentals.description: A tranquil retreat with modern amenities and close proximity to Gokarna’s beaches and temples.

vacation_rentals.name: Vrbo - Coastal Villa
vacation_rentals.description: A spacious villa with ocean views, ideal for families or groups looking for a peaceful getaway.

hostels.name: Zostel Gokarna
hostels.description: A lively hostel offering dorms and private rooms with a social atmosphere, located near Gokarna’s beaches.

hostels.name: Moustache Gokarna
hostels.description: A budget-friendly hostel providing clean and comfortable dorms with a relaxed vibe.

hostels.name: The Backpackers Hostel
hostels.description: A cozy hostel with a focus on community and cultural exchange, offering affordable accommodations.
